name: Do you Popcorn
description:
why bother playing this game when you can read the description here:-

Your boss wants to prepare popcorn. Use your Shotgun to cook up some popcorn but hey...don't miss! 

WARNING: This is a chaotic game. It is a Keyboard centric game involving all the keys of the keyboard...it is MEANT TO TEST YOUR inner voice!

 From Art and code work, it's me to blame.
